data.title: Call | Developments of professions: Observed with Niklas Luhmann’s systems theory
data.meta_description: Development of professions: Observed with Niklas Luhmann's systems theory Time: 20-22 September 2017 (with optional informal get-togethers on 18-19 September) Place: International University Centre (IUC), Dubrovnik, Croatia Special guest: Stephan Fuchs, University of Virginia, US. Conference organizers: Gorm Harste, Aarhus University, Denmark; Steffen Roth, La Rochelle Business School, France, and Yerevan State University, Armenia; Gina Atzeni, LMU Munich, Germany; Morten…
data.text:
Development of professions: Observed with Niklas Luhmann’s systems theory

Place: International University Centre (IUC), Dubrovnik, Croatia

Special guest: Stephan Fuchs, University of Virginia, US.

Conference organizers: Gorm Harste, Aarhus University, Denmark; Steffen Roth, La Rochelle Business School, France, and Yerevan State University, Armenia; Gina Atzeni, LMU Munich, Germany; Morten Knudsen, Copenhagen Business School, Denmark.

Deadline for abstract submission: 20 August 2017.
